ClassDef.summary: Image button with flat appearance, border visible only when activated by mouse.

overloads.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, with default settings.

Constructor.name: (Image)
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, with specified image for enabled button.
Constructor.param: The object to show when the button is enabled. The disabled image will be draw based on this image.

Constructor.name: (Image, Image)
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, with specified images for enabled and disabled button.
Constructor.param: The object to show when the button is enabled.
The object to show when the button is disabled.

Property.name: BorderColor
Property.summary: Gets or sets the border color for the control.
Property.value: A object that represents the border color of the control.

Property.name: BorderWidth
Property.summary: Gets or sets the border width for the control.
Property.value: A integer that represents the border width for the control, in pixel. The default is 1.

Property.name: ImageDisabled
Property.summary: Gets or sets the image to display for the control when disabled.
Property.value: A object to display for the control when disabled.

Property.name: ImageEnabled
Property.summary: Gets or sets the image to display for the control when enabled.
Property.value: A object to display for the control when enabled.

Property.name: ImageIndexDisabled
Property.summary: Gets or sets the index of the image to display for the control when disabled.
Property.value: The zero-base index of the image in the to display for the control when disabled.

Property.name: ImageIndexEnabled
Property.summary: Gets or sets the index of the image to display for the control when enabled.
Property.value: The zero-base index of the image in the to display for the control when enabled.

Property.name: ImageList
Property.summary: Gets or sets the that contains the images to display.
Property.value: The that contains the images to display.

Property.name: IsPopup
Property.summary: Determines if the buttons is displayed as popup when activated.
Property.value: True if the button is displayed as popup when activated; otherwise false. The default value is true.

Property.name: Monochrome
Property.summary: Determines if the button is displayed as black and white.
Property.value: True if the button is displayed as as black and white; otherwise false. The default value is false.

Property.name: TextAlign
Property.summary: Gets or sets the alignment of the text in the button.
Property.value: One of the values. The default is MiddleCenter.

Property.name: ToolTipText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for this button.
Property.value: The ToolTip text for this button.
